Package fr.univlille.iutinfo.game

Enum Class Item

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<Item>
fr.univlille.iutinfo.game.Item
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<Item>, Constable
public enum Item extends Enum<Item>
The Item enum represents different types of items that can be used in the game. Each item has a specific number of uses, an associated texture, and a name. Items can be used by either the monster or the hunter, as indicated by the whoUseIt field. The enum also includes methods to use an item, check if it's expired, and generate random items.
